question: The PCR will collect data from which of the following entities?
option3: Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India
explanation: The PCR will include data from entities such as SEBI, the Corporate Affairs Ministry, the Goods and Service Tax Network (GSTN) and the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI). It will enable banks and financial institutions to get a 360-degree profile of the existing, as well as prospective, borrowers on a real-time basis.
